text: Unlawful Entry is a 1992 American psychological thriller movie directed by Jonathan Kaplan and starring Kurt Russell, Madeleine Stowe, Ray Liotta. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1992 thriller movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Kaplan Category:Movies about police misconduct Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies about stalking Category:Movies about home invasions
title: Unlawful Entry (movie)
